name: Portal Run (T3triez, Yourio_, DarkWolf_MJ)
description:
The testing:
You've been captured by an unknown entity and are put into an eerie looking laboratory. Here you find a device that has the potential to create portals! You make a run for it, trying to escape the lab.

How to play:
In this game you have to reach the end of the level by guiding your character through portals. The character always runs to the right, so make sure you place the portals in time, because if your character hits a wall, you start over!

Controls:
On PC
Left mouse button: Place blue portal
Right mouse button: Place right portal

On mobile
Touch to place a portal
Touch again to place the next
